channel.title: R&D on Tianshi's Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in R&D on Tianshi's Homepage

item.title: Data-driven Upper-limb Prosthesis Control and Validation
item.author: tians.yu7@gmail.com (Tianshi (Tim) Yu)
item.description: Develop machine learning and control algorithms for human intention detection and prosthesis control with validation using VR and robotic prototypes.

item.title: Wearable Sensor Systems for Seamless Human-Machine Interaction
item.author: tians.yu7@gmail.com (Tianshi (Tim) Yu)
item.description: Develop novel wearable sensor systems enabling accurate human intention detection (e.g., hand gesture recognition), and allowing seamless interaction.

item.title: Data-driven Modelling for Human-Robot Interaction in Mining and Maritime Industry
item.author: tians.yu7@gmail.com (Tianshi (Tim) Yu)
item.description: Develop human state prediction model used in VR training for effective human-autonomy collaboration.

item.title: Pneumatic-based Automation System
item.author: tians.yu7@gmail.com (Tianshi (Tim) Yu)
item.description: Develop pneumatic-based mechatronic systems including pneumatic engine test rig and industrial assembly system using ARM Cortex-M and PLC.
